dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2879 IH: Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kinzinger of Illinois (for himself, Mr. Shimkus, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, Mrs. Bustos, and Mr. Bost) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To include Livingston County, the city of Jonesboro in Union County, and the city of Freeport in Stephenson County, Illinois, to the Lincoln National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act.

section.header: Adjustment of boundaries of Lincoln National Heritage Area

subsection.text: Section 443(b)(1) of the Consolidated Natural Resources Act of 2008 (Public Law 110–229; 16 U.S.C. 461 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting , Livingston, after LaSalle; and
by inserting , the city of Jonesboro in Union County, and the city of Freeport in Stephenson County after Woodford counties.

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Interior shall update the map referred to in section 443(b)(2) of the Consolidated Natural Resources Act of 2008 to reflect the boundary adjustment made by the amendments in subsection (a) of this section.
